items.sentence: Tom came to stay with us for a few days last spring.
Tom can play the guitar and is also good at singing.
I didn\'t see you at my cocktail party last weekend.
Tom donates half his salary to his favorite charity.
I think Tom would\'ve stayed longer if he could\'ve.
Tom thought that Mary would be too busy to help him.
Tom threw a rock at the bottle, hit it and broke it.
Who would have dreamed that Tom would ever graduate?
Would you like to go out and get something to drink?
You can probably buy one of these cheaper elsewhere.
